title: Virtual Urgent Care
description: Connect with a board-certified Emergency or Pediatric Emergency Medicine Physician from your phone, tablet, or computer 7 days a week.

title: Video Visits
description: Save time traveling to and waiting in the doctor office by video conferencing with your doctor instead

title: Second Opinion
description: Get a second opinion, virtually, from the expert teams from Columbia and Weill Cornell Medicine.

title: Inter-Hospital Consults
description: Experts from across the organization working together to improve patient outcomes.

title: Express Care
description: Leveraging the latest technologies to improve wait times in the Emergency Departments.

title: Virtual appointments
description: The doctor or nurse practitioner can prescribe medications, suggest home care strategies or recommend additional medical care.
